titles.title: Professional Military Education Review Act of 2020
To direct the Secretary of Defense to review and report to Congress on the status of the professional military education enterprise, and for other purposes.
Professional Military Education Review Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Professional Military Education Review Act of 2020
This bill directs the Department of Defense to submit to Congress a specified report on the status of the professional military education enterprise.
